A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's the worst Star Wars movie to date; with a couple of memorable moments and too much progressive agenda. Sexual diversity\, feminism\, minorities\, are things that are appreciated when they are natural in history\, not when they put on shoehorns. Writers do not understand the universe of star wars\, jedi and / or the force. If it were a movie outside of that universe it could have 3 stars; but in the universe of star wars it's a crap.
